item.title: Report X-2024050579
item.description:
Report X-2024050579

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-17T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-02
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING LIQUID. OUTER CARTON HAD NO HAZARD MARKINGS. RESPONDER PUT PACKAGE UPRIGHT INTO A SPILL TRAY AND ABSORBED SPILT LIQUID WITH ZEP ZORBENT AND CLAY ABSORBENT. PACKAGE WAS OPENED AND FOUND TO CONTAIN A GALLON BUCKET MARKED WITH A CLASS 3 FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND AND UN1993(HEPTANE). PACKAGE ALSO CONAINED 3 AEROSOL CANS. CAP OF BUCKET WAS DEFECTIVE WHICH CAUSED LIQUID TO LEAK.

item.title: Report E-2024050255
item.description:
Report E-2024050255

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-15T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-27
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XKC. It was reported that approximately 3 gallons of Prep-All Wax & Grease Remover were released from (1) box containing (4) 1-gallon metal cans due to a forklift puncture. The release impacted a total of 9 boxes and the concrete dock floor.
